forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 73, with temperatures falling to around 69 in the afternoon. South wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 2am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 51, with temperatures rising to around 54 overnight. Southwest wind 9 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
